name: Hero Beetle War: Tower Attack
summary:
In the world of shadow ninjas, role-playing a skilled ninja fighting against hordes of devil ninjas to save your girlfriend.
Your beloved has been kidnapped, and the only way to get her back is to parkour through a massive tower filled with enemies at every level. But don't worry coz you have some powerful skills up your sleeve. You can use your shadow power and beetle jitsu to brawl against the devil ninjas, even the strongest boss in multiple epic fights.
As you fight through thousands of battles, you will become as strong as a superman. With each level, you will need to choose which enemy to fight first to build up your strength and become the strongest avenger of them all.
But the path to victory is not easy. You will face many challenges on your journey, and only the most skilled and cunning ninjas will succeed. Do you have what it takes to save your girlfriend and become the ultimate avenger? The fate of your love and the world rests in your hands.
So, gear up with your ninja weapons and get ready for an epic adventure in Hero Beetle War.
